summary: If you are looking for crisp clear and realistic looking face textures for female human and elf characters this mod might be a good choice for you. It is basically a massively upscaled version of Navetsea\'s wonderful face textures.
descriptionHtml:
About the Mod

If you are looking for crisp clear and realistic looking face textures for female human and elf characters this mod might be a good choice for you. It is basically a massively upscaled and slightly tweaked version of Navetsea\'s wonderful face textures. The normalmaps now have a 4096x4096 resolution, while the other textures are scaled to 2048x2048.


Required Mods

No mods are required for my work. It should work out well with the vanilla as well as with custom races like the fabulous Temptress Race by Psychosis and Brokefoot. To complement the look I recommend to use the lip tintmasks from my other mod \"Seductive Lips HD\" or other mods like MrLenski\'s \"Coverwomen\", Bella\'s \"Better females\",etc.


Installation

Use NMM or put the \"Data\" folder into your Skyrim directory and say \"yes\" when being asked to integrate or overwrite files.

If you do a manual installation I HIGHLY RECOMMEND to backup your textures/character folder which usually can be found under Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/textures/character . This can be done by simply creating a copy of your textures/character folder which you can save somewhere else to be able to revert to your original settings in case you want to do that.

If you want to use my face textures for your CUSTOM RACE which uses separate textures like the Temptress or Lunari races you will have to put it into the mod specific \"textures\" folder, e.g. C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\temptress\\actors\\character.


Uninstallation

Delete the following data within your textures/character folder

- female/femalehead.dds
- female/femalehead_msn.dds
- female/femalehead_sk.dds
- female/femalehead_s.dds 
- bretonfemale/femalehead_msn.dds
- darkelffemale/femalehead_msn.dds
- highelffemale/femalehead_msn.dds
- imperialfemale/femalehead_msn.dds
- redguardfemale/femalehead_msn.dds
- woodelffemale/femalehead_msn.dds
If you have used another mod which changed the look of the face textures before installing mine you can just copy the files from your \"old\" textures/character folder back into it to re-activate the other mod\'s changes.


Known Issues

As with other custom textures you might experience some neck seam, depending on the body textures you use. These textures were created by Navetsea to accompany and complement his own body textures ( link in the credit section ), so they should work seamlessly there. I use my face textures with the UNP HD body textures by Dimon99 which also leads to good results.


Featured in :

- Body Imperfect by betterbecause - check out his awesome mod!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394

Credits :

navetsea for his fantastic face textures within the
\"CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible\" mod which I took as a base for my work.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554

Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit.


Author\'s note :

First and foremost I have created this  mod for my own purpose, but since I get frequently asked questions about the face textures of the characters of my other mods or on the images IIoad up I decided to share my work here on the Nexus. It is neither perfect nor a work of art, but for me it makes the game more beautiful and maybe some of you will share that feeling.

If you like it please endorse, leave a comment or load up a picture - I will really apprechiate it. You should also endorse Navetsea\'s original mod, because HE is the true artist.

 If you face issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution together.
author: EcthelionOtW
